name: 'Star Trek' Multiple Character Actors Quiz / Test | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Romulan Commander (TOS ep 'Balance of Terror'), Klingon Captain (Star Trek: The Motion Picture), and Sarek (various).
questions.explanation:
Mark Lenard.

	Interestingly, Lenard has 'died' in all three of these roles.

questions.text: All TOS episodes: Mea 3 ('A Taste of Armageddon'), Philana ('Plato's Stepchildren'), Trelane's mother ('The Squire of Gothos'), Commander Loskene ('The Tholian Web'), Isis the Cat (uncreditted, 'Assignment Earth').
questions.explanation:
Barbara Babcock.

	Babcock is probably better known as Grace Gardner on 'Hill Street Blues'.

Merritt Butrick.

	Dr. David Marcus was Capt. Kirk's son by his long-lost love Carol Marcus.

questions.text: Minister Hanok (DS9 ep 'Starship Down'), Jaglom Shrek (TNG ep 'Birthright'), Zefram Cochrane (Star Trek: First Contact), Nayrok (TNG ep 'The Hunted')
questions.explanation:
James Cromwell & Jamie Cromwell.

	Cromwell is significantly older than the originator of the role of Cochrane, but this is explained in ST lore: the radiation that Cochrane was exposed to in his warp engine work prematurely aged him (TNG movie 'First Contact'). Then when he was found and cared for by The Companion in TOS ep 'Metamorphosis', he became much more youthful looking.

questions.text: Rene Picard (TNG ep 'Family'), Young Jean-Luc Picard (TNG ep 'Rascals')
questions.correct: David Tristan Birkin & David Birkin & Birkin
questions.explanation:
David Tristan Birkin & David Birkin & Birkin.

	Not the only actor to portray a character and then one of that characters relatives (nephew & uncle in this case).  William Shatner play Capt. Kirk (TOS) and his brother George Samuel Kirk (or body thereof) in the TOS ep 'Operation: Annihilate!'.

questions.text: Borg Queen (Star Trek: Voyager), Dr. Lenara Kahn (DS9 ep 'Rejoined'), Inmate Jaya (TNG ep 'Frame of Mind'), Varel (TNG ep 'The Next Phase')
questions.explanation:
Susanna Thompson.

	Ms. Thompson played the Borg Queen more than the originator of the role, Alice Krige.  However, Krige reprised the role for the final story of Voyager, 'Endgame'.

questions.text: Third Malon Engineer (VOY ep 'Juggernaut'), Vorik (Star Trek: Voyager), Taurik (TNG ep 'Lower Decks'), Young Reporter (TNG ep 'Time's Arrow')
questions.explanation:
Alexander Enberg & Alex Enberg.

	I thought it would've been a stroke of continuity genius to make Enberg's two Vulcan roles the same character.  But alas, no.

questions.text: Commodore Jose Mendez (TOS ep 'The Menagerie'), Senator Pardek (TNG ep 'Unification')
questions.explanation:
Malachi Throne.

	Throne also was the voice of the Keeper in the TOS pilot ep 'The Cage', footage of which was used in the TOS ep 'The Menagerie'.

questions.text: Penk (VOY ep 'Tsunkatse'), Brunt (DS9), Weyoun (DS9), Mulkahey (DS9 ep 'Far Beyond the Stars'), Tiron (DS9) ep 'Meridian')
questions.explanation:
Jeffrey Combs & Jeffery Combs.

	Update: Combs also plays the Andorian named Shran and the Ferengi Krem on the Star Trek prequel 'Enterprise'.

questions.text: Number One (Star Trek pilot 'The Cage', TOS ep 'The Menagerie'), Nurse Chapel (TOS), Lwaxana Troi (TNG, DS9), voice of Federation Computers (TOS, TNG, DS9, VOY)
questions.correct: Majel Barrett & Majel Barrett-Roddenberry & Majel Barrett Roddenberry & M Lee Hudec & Majel Lee Hudec & Majel Roddenberry
questions.explanation:
Majel Barrett & Majel Barrett-Roddenberry & Majel Barrett Roddenberry & M Lee Hudec & Majel Lee Hudec & Majel Roddenberry.

	She was also Gene Roddenberry's wife from 12/29/69 to his death 10/24/91.
